value.description: The list of binary hardening results.

nextLink.description: The uri to fetch the next page of resources.

properties.title: binary hardening result properties
properties.description: The properties of a binary hardening result found within a firmware image

binaryHardeningId.description: ID for the binary hardening result.

architecture.description: The architecture of the uploaded firmware.

class.description: The executable class to indicate 32 or 64 bit.

runpath.description: The runpath of the uploaded firmware.

rpath.description: The rpath of the uploaded firmware.

BinaryHardeningSummaryResource.description: Properties for a binary hardening analysis summary.

totalFiles.description: Total number of binaries that were analyzed

role.description: Role of the certificate (Root CA, etc)

signatureAlgorithm.description: The signature algorithm used in the certificate.

keySize.description: Size of the certificate's key in bits

keyAlgorithm.description: Key algorithm used in the certificate.

usage.description: List of functions the certificate can fulfill.

filePaths.description: List of files where this certificate was found.

isExpired.description: Indicates if the certificate is expired.

isSelfSigned.description: Indicates if the certificate is self-signed.

isWeakSignature.description: Indicates the signature algorithm used is insecure.

isShortKeySize.description: Indicates the certificate's key size is considered too small to be secure for the key algorithm.

CryptoCertificateEntity.description: Information on an entity (distinguished name) in a cryptographic certificate.

commonName.description: Common name of the certificate entity.

organizationalUnit.description: The organizational unit of the certificate entity.

state.description: Geographical state or province of the certificate entity.

country.description: Country code of the certificate entity.

value.description: The list of crypto certificate results.

nextLink.description: The uri to fetch the next page of resources.

properties.title: Crypto certificate properties
properties.description: The properties of a crypto certificate found within a firmware image

pairedKeys.description: Total number of paired private keys found for the certificates.

expired.description: Total number of expired certificates found.

expiringSoon.description: Total number of nearly expired certificates found.

weakSignature.description: Total number of certificates found using a weak signature algorithm.

selfSigned.description: Total number of certificates found that are self-signed.

shortKeySize.description: Total number of certificates found that have an insecure key size for the key algorithm.

keyType.description: Type of the key (public or private).

keySize.description: Size of the key in bits.

filePaths.description: List of files where this key was found.

pairedKey.description: A matching paired key or certificate.

isShortKeySize.description: Indicates the key size is considered too small to be secure for the algorithm.

value.description: The list of crypto key results.

nextLink.description: The uri to fetch the next page of resources.

properties.title: Crypto key properties
properties.description: The properties of a crypto key found within a firmware image

totalKeys.description: Total number of cryptographic keys found.

publicKeys.description: Total number of (non-certificate) public keys found.

privateKeys.description: Total number of private keys found.

pairedKeys.description: Total number of keys found that have a matching paired key or certificate.

shortKeySize.description: Total number of keys found that have an insecure key size for the algorithm.

CveComponent.description: Properties of the SBOM component for a CVE.

CveLink.description: Properties of a reference link for a CVE.

href.description: The destination of the reference link.

label.description: The label of the reference link.

nextLink.description: The uri to fetch the next page of resources.

properties.title: CVE result properties
properties.description: The properties of a CVE result found within a firmware image

component.description: The SBOM component for the CVE.

cvssScore.description: A single CVSS score to represent the CVE. If a V3 score is specified, then it will use the V3 score. Otherwise if the V2 score is specified it will be the V2 score.

cvssV2Score.description: CVSS V2 score of the CVE.

cvssV3Score.description: CVSS V3 score of the CVE.

links.description: The list of reference links for the CVE.

CveResult.description: Details of a CVE detected in firmware.

CveSummary.description: Properties for a CVE analysis summary.

critical.description: The total number of critical severity CVEs detected

high.description: The total number of high severity CVEs detected

medium.description: The total number of medium severity CVEs detected

low.description: The total number of low severity CVEs detected

unknown.description: The total number of unknown severity CVEs detected

nextLink.description: The uri to fetch the next page of asset.

fileName.description: File name for a firmware that user uploaded.

fileSize.description: File size of the uploaded firmware image.

statusMessages.description: A list of errors or other messages generated during firmware analysis

FirmwareSummary.description: Properties for high level summary of firmware analysis results.

extractedSize.description: Total extracted size of the firmware in bytes.

rootFileSystems.description: The number of root file systems found.

properties.title: Firmware properties
properties.description: The editable properties of a firmware

GenerateUploadUrlRequest.description: Properties for generating an upload URL

firmwareId.description: A unique ID for the firmware to be uploaded.

PairedKey.description: Details of a matching paired key or certificate.

id.description: ID of the paired key or certificate.

type.description: The type indicating whether the paired object is a key or certificate.

filePath.description: File path of the password hash

value.description: The list of password hash results.

nextLink.description: The uri to fetch the next page of resources.

properties.title: Password hash properties
properties.description: The properties of a password hash found within a firmware image

filePaths.description: File paths related to the component.

nextLink.description: The uri to fetch the next page of resources.

properties.title: SBOM result properties
properties.description: The properties of an SBOM component found within a firmware image

nextLink.description: The uri to fetch the next page of resources.

SummaryResource.description: The object representing a firmware analysis summary resource.

url.description: SAS URL for creating or accessing a blob file.

UrlToken.description: Url data for creating or accessing a blob file.
